mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board_sell(bno, writer, title, content, price, district, category) values(seq_board_sell.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{price}, #{district}, #{category})
mapper.update: update tbl_board_sell set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, price = #{price}, district = #{district}, category = #{category}, updateDate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_board_sell where bno > 0
